articles.title: BSNL, MTNL merger: Employees union urges PM Modi to drop proposal
articles.description: BSNL employees union also suggested the government take over MTNL's  ₹26,000 crore debt and provide financial assistance to BSNL
articles.content: New Delhi: Bharat Sanchar Nigam Limited (BSNL) Employees Union has appealed to Prime Minister Narendra Modi to "drop proposal to merge Mahanagar Telephone Nigam Limited (MTNL) with BSNL".
